purpose: Manual canonicalization layer for naming variance across sources (makam / perde / cesni). This file is intentionally hand-curated and can be extended over time.

notes: Aliases should include common Latin transliterations, ASCII-fied forms, and optionally Russian spellings.
Do not add automatic token reordering or fuzzy matching rules here; keep normalization deterministic and auditable.
Prefer canonical names that match the spellings used in docs/makam_dna/MAKAM_DNA.json (when possible).
